ICITL 2018

1st International Conference of Innovative Technologies and Learning

Aug 27-29, 2018 , Piran Portorož, Slovenija

Paper Submission Registration

About ICITL 2018

ICITL 2018, the first Annual International Conference of Innovative Technologies and Learning, ICITL is opened to the public for organizing a workshop or track to achieve diversity of the symposium.


All accepted papers presented at the conference will be published as a volume in Springer Lecture Notes in Computer Science (LNCS).
